name: Mist Survival
description: MIST SURVIVAL is a Single-player, survival stealth sandbox game Players will experience the Apocalypse stimulation in the form of virus pandemic, the players have to deal with it to survive through the difficulties such as finding shelter and food, threats from the environment and climate: wild animals, bandits, infected, and dense mist t
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 560 or better Storage: 13 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 770 or better Storage: 13 GB available space
